autoconfirm.name: Auto confirm all users
autoconfirm.description: This template confirms all users and sets the user's email and phone_number attributes to verified if the attribute is present. Also, if aliasing is enabled, aliases will be created for phone_number and email when auto-verify is set.

autoconfirm-domain.name: Auto confirm all users from registered domain
autoconfirm-domain.description: This template auto-confirms users from a registered domain.
